channel.title: Pocket Gamer | www.pocketgamer.co.uk | Latest additions (iPhone)
channel.description: The latest stories from Pocket Gamer, updated every five minutes.

item.title: Review: The House of the Dead: Overkill - The Lost Reels
Top 10 best one-button games on iPhone
item.description: iPhone gaming appeals to a far broader crowd than the traditional consoles do.

item.title: Space Hulk dev answers questions on multiplayer options, game rules
Ecco the Dolphin creator's The Big Blue game fails to reach its Kickstarter target
item.description: Ed Annunziata's attempt to crowdfund a spiritual successor to the Mega Drive swim-'em-up Ecco the Dolphin, The Big Blue, has been scuttled. Just $55,764 of the target $665,000 amount was pledged before the clock hit zero on Annunziata's Kickstarter campaign. But that's not going to deter our Ed. Oh, no, no, no, no, no. Aiming for a smaller crowd Rather than resting on his laurels, Annu...

item.title: Gold Award-winning tower offence titles Anomaly Warzone Earth and Anomaly Korea on sale for limited time
item.description: Polish developer 11 bit studios is celebrating the (presumably) impending release of Anomaly 2 by slashing the price of Anomaly Warzone Earth and Anomaly Korea. You can now grab Chillingo's Gold Award-winning tower offence title Anomaly Warzone Earth for your iPhone from the App Store for just 69p / 99c. If you want to play it on your iPad, mind, you're probably better off purchasing the Uni...

item.title: Golden Ruby takes a leaf out of Halfbrick's book by submitting a Worm Run update full of Jetpack Joyride-style missions
item.description: We really liked Worm Run when it raced onto iOS earlier in the year. Golden Ruby Games's clever blend of twitch platforming and ever-encroaching death was one of the primary reasons its game earned a prestigious Gold Award in our review. So, when we got passed a note informing us that Golden Ruby has submitted version 2.0 of the game to Apple, we could barely contain ourselves. When we th...

item.title: EE expands its 4G network to 12 more UK towns
item.description: Fact #1: EE is the UK's only 4G network (for now). Fact #2: EE has just added a bunch of new towns and cities to its collection of 4G-enabled areas. If you want to download the latest 1GB mobile game on the move, 4G is, as our EE network test last year demonstrated, definitely the best option. Unless you were living in or around a rather big UK city, such as London, Birmingham, or Manches...

item.title: Sling It! follow-up Perfection delivering 'simple, soothing' puzzles to iOS and Android gamers in May
item.description: If you enjoyed Dumb and Fat's Silver Award-winning puzzler Sling It!, you'll probably be delighted to read that the studio's follow-up game, Perfection, will be released early next month. According to its developer, Perfection is a "simple, soothing" puzzle game all about cutting shapes so that they fit inside a variety of outlines. There are an infinite number of these outlines to fill, and...

item.title: New editing tools, revamped file system, bug fixes, and more in massive update to Topia World Builder
item.description: A huge update has landed on the verdant fields and arid wastelands of Glenn Corpes's Bronze Award-winning iOS game Topia World Builder. Chief among the new additions are the Scale, Offset, and Smooth tools, which enable you to play with the terrain on a global scale. Players rocking older iOS devices will be relieved to read that there's going to be a lot less slowdown when they're painting ...
